spec_data.Name: xerces-c27-doc
spec_data.Description:
Documentation for Xerces-C++ 2.7.0.

Xerces-C++ is a validating XML parser written in a portable subset of C++.
Xerces-C++ makes it easy to give your application the ability to read and
write XML data. A shared library is provided for parsing, generating,
manipulating, and validating XML documents.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 12:50:47 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Documentation for Xerces-C++ validating XML parser
